stimulusHtml:
This question is based on one or two slides. For a question involving two slides, when you are not asked specifically to name the artists and/or titles of the works, you may refer to the work on the left as (L) and the work on the right as (R).

A response that answers the question directly will receive a higher score than one that simply lists characteristics or includes irrelevant points.

Thomas Cole painted the work shown.

Identify the art historical school with which Cole was associated. Discuss how this painting embodies the political, social, or philosophical ideas of its time.
